name: Promotion Class: Brigand
description:
Role: Melee Damage

A stealthy lurker of the shadows focused solely on melee weapons and eliminating their victims with lethal traps.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +225

Traits Granted:
Recurve Bow Mastery
Axe Mastery
Mace Mastery
Short Sword Mastery
Energy Regeneration in all Trays

Enhancements:
Sweep: Now applies a Barrier.
Concussive Trap: Now can be placed from Stealth.
Twin Surge: Now deals more damage against Bleeding targets.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Brigand promotion class and prevents access to the Warden and Archer promotion classes.
